sentences.en: ...a clump of trees bordering a side road.
A stream meandered gently through a clump of trees.
sentences.cn: 一条小溪从树丛中蜿蜒穿过.

sentences.en: Brown rice takes longer to cook but it doesn't clump together as easily as white rice.
sentences.cn: 糙米不容易熟，但不会像精米那样容易粘在一起。

sentences.en: Do say yes: to that clump of birches at the turn!
sentences.cn: 说可以吧!就走到转弯地方那丛桦树那儿!

sentences.en: Exasperated, he leaped the stream, and strode towards beech clump.
sentences.cn: 他满腔恼怒, 跳过小河, 大踏步向毛榉林子走去.

sentences.en: Hair and soap had clumped together in the drain.
sentences.cn: 头发和肥皂在排水管里结成了团。

sentences.en: I heard the clump of Ralph’s boots going up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我听到拉尔夫上楼，他的靴子踩得噔噔响。

sentences.en: In general, fine particles tend to clump and agglomerate if they are moist or tacky.
sentences.cn: 通常潮湿和粘性的微细颗粒易于聚集和结块.

sentences.en: It was as if he had hacked with his thick boots at a clump of bluebells.
sentences.cn: 仿佛他用自己的厚靴子无情地践踏了一丛野风信子.

sentences.en: On a sheep - cropped knou under a clump of elms we ate the strawberries.
sentences.cn: 我们在榆树下草尖被羊啃掉的小丘上吃草莓.

sentences.en: Take care the spy hiding inside the bush clump, and is watching that house continuously.
sentences.cn: 小心隐藏在灌木丛里的间谍, 一直监视着那幢房子.

sentences.en: That clump down near the bottom.
The church then peeped out modestly from a clump of trees.
sentences.cn: 接着教堂从一丛绿树中含羞似地探出头来.

sentences.en: The pieces clump together to form asteroids and bigger planets.
sentences.cn: 这些碎片凝结在一起,形成小行星和更大的行星.

sentences.en: The spade sank into a clump of overgrown bushes.
sentences.cn: 铲子插入了一丛长势旺盛的灌木丛。

sentences.en: The twelve of us slept together in a clump.
sentences.cn: 我们十二个挤成一团睡觉.

sentences.en: Then followed a loud Clump! Clump! As they rushed up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 登! 登!登! 一阵楼梯板响,匪徒们上楼了.

sentences.en: Wait for when pediment is brilliant, they laugh in the clump.
sentences.cn: 待到山花烂漫时, 她们在丛中笑.

trans.tran_en: a group of trees, bushes, or other plants growing very close together

trans.tran_cn: 形成一丛；以沉重的步子行走
trans.tran_en: to walk with slow noisy steps
